Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory227.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct A', 3: 'Affiliation unknown, and there are no bionic machines infected with the virus in the group. Has the route alliance been fighting them?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Construct B', 3: 'From our observations over our visit, this does seem to be the case. This is something that only happens in this polar region.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: "The numbers on the report shouldn't have any mistakes, right?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'On the snow, a group of Constructs and a Commandant discuss the current situation.'}
{3: "The Commandant, who doesn't look in good shape, leans on a tree in the middle of the discussion to make it more comfortable. The Construct also express concern for his physical condition."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct A', 3: 'Commandant Simon, should we head back to the alliance Stronghold first?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Simon', 3: "I have a little OCD, so I will be even more uncomfortable if I don't sort out the current problems.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'And so he sits on the ground and picks up a fallen branch to make a map in the snow.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Simon', 3: 'This route is not under attack by unknown bionic machines. Their defense is insufficient, so they have asked Babylonia to lend support.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Simon', 3: 'And the higher ups have decided to divide the support in two stages. The first stage would be done by us, land forces that can be deployed immediately.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Simon', 3: 'The second stage will be done by the support sent from Babylonia, led by one of the Forest Guard and named Rosetta.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Construct A', 3: 'So the support should be arriving in a few days, right?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Simon', 3: 'Yes. We can start various operations when they do, like driving off the bionic machines and taking back the occupied alliance ship route area...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: 'I hear the support troops will also have their Commandant.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Simon', 3: 'Atiel... Where did you run off to?', 4: '1'}
{3: "A Construct runs out of the forest, interrupting Simon's thoughts. The marks on her body show that she has been fighting something up to a moment ago."}
{2: 'Simon', 3: "Can't you listen to commands? You're always running around... I've stressed how important teamwork is, right?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Atiel', 3: 'What I do is also beneficial to the battle. But I wonder how our ragtag team is going to match up with the Commandant the higher-ups sent.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct A', 3: "It's true that we're temporary troops transferred from various teams, but can't you put it more nicely?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Simon', 3: 'Including me, all of them were temporarily transferred... The main fighting force can only look to HQ.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Atiel', 3: 'Simon, your face is all tensed up again. Relax!', 4: '2'}
{3: 'So saying, Atiel slaps Simon hard on the back again. She means well and to encourage a comrade, but it is like a huge blow to Simon.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct B', 3: "You start throwing up as expected... I'll bury it in the snow later.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'While Simon is still in pain, a message is suddenly transmitted from Babylonia.'}
{2: 'System', 3: '—【kuroname】.'}
{2: 'Simon', 3: 'Ahem... I see. Get the representative here... Ugh.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Atiel', 3: "Talking as you throw up? You're pushing yourself too hard, Simon.", 4: '1'}
